Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Relates to authorizing certain providers of services to administer and dispense methadone or other controlled substances
Summary: Relates to requirements for certain providers of services to be authorized to administer and dispense methadone or other controlled substances, including the establishment of a community advisory board.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to authorizing certain providers of services to administer and dispense methadone or other controlled substances
